definition: to be in hospital/to be hospitalized
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)
courtyard/institution/CL:個|个[ge4]
to receive hospital treatment/to be hospitalized
inpatient department

sentences.english: Methods 37 cases of in-patients with schizophrenia were treated with Quetiatine for 8 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 方法對37例精神分裂症住院病人用奎的平治療8周。

sentences.english: They looked at long-term sick leave (of over 90 days) and hospital admission rates.
sentences.chinese: 他們關注的重點是超過90天的長時間病假和住院率。

sentences.english: Three people were hospitalized with minor lacerations.
sentences.chinese: 有三個人因輕微撕裂傷住院。

sentences.english: During my stay in bed, some of them came to see me and helped me with my lessons.
sentences.chinese: 我住院期間，一些同學來探望我，並幫我補習功課。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the factors affecting medical care costs of inpatients.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析住院病人住院費用的影響因素。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the factors affecting medical care costs of inpatients.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析住院病人住院費用的影響因素。

sentences.english: The time of stay in SICU and mortality rate were recorded.
sentences.chinese: 兩組住院時間和病死率差異無顯著性意義。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the in-patient satisfaction of medical service.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解住院病人對醫療服務的滿意情況。

sentences.english: Carmen is a teddy bear that Ashley had received as a gift when she was in the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 卡門是一隻泰迪熊，是艾詩麗住院期間收到的禮物。

sentences.english: To investigate the distribution and frequency of symptoms in manic- depressive disorder.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查住院躁狂和抑鬱症的症狀分佈和頻度。

sentences.english: You may go back to the hotel so long as your fever allays .
sentences.chinese: 不用住院，只要不發燒，就可以回去。

sentences.english: The atmosphere on an inpatient ward is tense because of this exerted energy.
sentences.chinese: 由於這種表露的幹勁，住院病房的氛圍很緊張。

sentences.english: Maalin was admitted to the hospital on October 25 with a presumptive diagnosis of malaria.
sentences.chinese: 馬阿林在10月25日初步診斷爲瘧疾住院。

sentences.english: That's four times the hospitalisation rate for healthy adults.
sentences.chinese: 這個數字是正常成年人感染後住院率的4倍。

sentences.english: Have you attended a hospital to receive medical treatment or been hospitalised in the past two years?
sentences.chinese: 過去兩年中，曾經住院或曾在醫院接受治療。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the outbreak of the hospital infection of the sufferers in brain surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結腦外科住院患者醫院感染的發病情況。

to receive medical treatment
